thread.title: lovely hotel, great location
thread.title_full: lovely hotel, great location - Review of Hotel Siena, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: bevtay2017
title: lovely hotel, great location
text:
lovely clean hotel, within walking distance to all the attractions Rome has to offer,friendly staff on reception and our room was ready as we arrived before 11am, only down side was we had a twin room, beds where a tad on the short side ! even my daughter commented, breakfast is continental and limited which we knew before we went, ok if you like cakes and pastries !!! only saw fruit out one morning in our three day stay. Would have liked to have been able to make a cup of tea in our room, no facilities for that which for me let it down slightly, but that's only my opinion, we Brits like our tea !!!
Room Tip: Beds where short in the twin room See more room tips
